Articles.Content: Hooray!!!!
You trolling motha......!
its nearly Wednesday here, and me still waiting, hope i can shoot a few rockets with new patch before sleepy
There it is! Download starting!

I would hazard a guess that you should not follow any links posted here. Somehow I doubt the team is going to update the download page on the site and then wait for any particularly long span before uploading a front page post and blog post about it.

Who could wait?

I'm sure not even chuck Norris could wait

Chuck Norris doesn't wait for KSP update, KSP update waits for Chuck Norris...duh!

I would hazard a guess that you should not follow any links posted here. Somehow I doubt the team is going to update the download page on the site and then wait for any particularly long span before uploading a front page post and blog post about it.

wow skyrender is still alive, who knew
the troll... it's unbearable.

This is why I scroll over the clickable thing, well that and I do not trust people that I do not know to click on the links they provide. I get a warning for making a comment about how a thread, or series of threads, is like kicking a dead horse, yet others can do this without punishment.....

And I am sure that I will get into trouble for speaking my mind as well, while people are able to troll.
That rapier engine looks awesome! SSTO for dummies, basically..

wow skyrender is still alive, who knew

That little session of peace-keeping a few days ago kind of took a bit out of me, along with the effort of assembling and co-ordinating a team to build an extended resources mod. But yes, I'm still here.
I'm assuming its global, so we should all get it at the same time...
This thread is more troll than wait.

Rickroll stopped being funny....wait it was not funny to begin with.

it actually made me smile though
Gwaaaaaaaaaa! Come on! This is the last few minutes I have to download the game!

Maybe Squad contracted Valve's syndrome.

It's a serious condition for every game developer.

That rapier engine looks awesome! SSTO for dummies, basically..

I will take that as a complement! I would rather be dumb and save weight by not needing 2 engines to play the game the way I want......with very few mods LOL. Although to be fair I did make a SSTO last night and got into orbit of 100km on the first try, but felt it would nice to only need one engine

Edited December 17, 2013 by Liowen
It's too easy when all of us are sitting here drooling, waiting for the first sign that .23 is out. I'm just tired of falling for it. If you can't beat 'em, join 'em.

That little session of peace-keeping a few days ago kind of took a bit out of me, along with the effort of assembling and co-ordinating a team to build an extended resources mod. But yes, I'm still here.

Well the forum will not be the same without you

It's too easy when all of us are sitting here drooling, waiting for the first sign that .23 is out. I'm just tired of falling for it. If you can't beat 'em, join 'em.

Ah the classic sheeple syndrome, never fails me how that makes every poor choice ok.
Some fun to pass the time.
What, am I the only one sitting here taking a nostalgia trip and playing 0.21 from my Archives?
I had to set steam to update it asap because this update is going to be my favorite of the many past updates.
i am gonna go eat now, if i come back there better be a .23 or i cry

Speaking of drool. I just happens to look down and see I'm swimming in mine. O.o

JK
